header.gameNote: ACC Tournament pres. by T. Rowe Price - Final

videos.headline: NC State completes stunning ACC title run to punch NCAA tourney bid
videos.description: NC State defeats North Carolina in the ACC championship game to punch its ticket into the NCAA tournament.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (NC State completes stunning ACC title run to punch NCAA tourney bid) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: NC State upsets UNC to complete unbelievable run to ACC tourney title
videos.description: North Carolina State wins its fifth game in as many days to win the ACC tournament and earn a bid to the Big Dance.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (NC State upsets UNC to complete unbelievable run to ACC tourney title) 2024/3/16 ESHEET SOTFULL SC

videos.headline: DJ Burns powers his way inside for a bucket
videos.description: NC State's DJ Burns backs down Armando Bacot and scores over him.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (DJ Burns powers his way inside for a bucket) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Mohamed Diarra is fired up after hitting a 3
videos.description: Mohamed Diarra cashes a 3-pointer for NC State.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Mohamed Diarra is fired up after hitting a 3) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Michael O'Connell drills a 3 for NC State
videos.description: Michael O'Connell knocks down a 3-pointer for the Wolfpack.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Michael O'Connell drills a 3 for NC State) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: RJ Davis knocks down a trey
videos.description: North Carolina's RJ Davis sinks a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (RJ Davis knocks down a trey) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: DJ Burns Jr. electrifies the crowd after nailing first career 3
videos.description: DJ Burns Jr. hits a 3-pointer at the top of the key and gets the NC State crowd on their feet.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (DJ Burns Jr. electrifies the crowd after nailing first career 3) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cormac Ryan beats the 1st-half buzzer for UNC
videos.description: Cormac Ryan buries a corner 3-pointer to beat the first-half buzzer for the Tar Heels.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Cormac Ryan beats the 1st-half buzzer for UNC) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harrison Ingram connects on the corner triple
videos.description: North Carolina's Harrison Ingram cashes a corner 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Harrison Ingram connects on the corner triple) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: DJ Burns Jr. spins and hits a bucket
videos.description: DJ Burns Jr. spins past a North Carolina defender and makes the jump hook.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (DJ Burns Jr. spins and hits a bucket) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: RJ Davis hits a pull-up jumper
videos.description: North Carolina's RJ Davis drains a pull-up jumper.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (RJ Davis hits a pull-up jumper) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: RJ Davis with a smooth finish for a layup
videos.description: RJ Davis sinks a layup in traffic for North Carolina.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (RJ Davis with a smooth finish for a layup) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: RJ Davis shows off his handles and sinks a floater
videos.description: North Carolina's RJ Davis uses a crossover to create separation and sinks the floater.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (RJ Davis shows off his handles and sinks a floater) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: DJ Horne is fired up after and-1 layup
videos.description: DJ Horne makes a layup, gets fouled and is pumped up after.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (DJ Horne is fired up after and-1 layup) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Casey Morsell knocks down a huge 3 for NC State
videos.description: Casey Morsell drains a huge 3-pointer for NC State.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Casey Morsell knocks down a huge 3 for NC State) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: DJ Burns Jr. finds a cutting DJ Horne for a layup
videos.description: DJ Burns Jr. hits a cutting DJ Horne for a layup for NC State.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (DJ Burns Jr. finds a cutting DJ Horne for a layup) 2024/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Greenberg puts NC State's 'historic' ACC run in perspective
videos.description: Seth Greenberg joins "SportsCenter" and praises NC State's improbable five-game run through the ACC tournament.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Analysis (Greenberg puts NC State's 'historic' ACC run in perspective) 2024/3/17 ESHEET SC

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.
